participant_1.name: Sofia
participant_1.personality: Sofia is energetic and expressive, with a vibrant love for pop music and lifestyle choices that emphasize self-care.
participant_1.background: i diet a lot. i'm high maintenance. i love listening to britney spears. i like to tan in tanning beds. i love spending money.

participant_2.name: Arjun
participant_2.personality: Arjun is independent and adventurous, often challenging traditional norms and embracing modernity.
participant_2.background: my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal. i'm a swim coach at my local pool.
